title: Wreck fish and crayfish with fennel purée and crayfish bisque
description: Crayfish sauce and fennel flavours complement simply fried white fish and crayfish tails. (If you can't find wreck fish try red snapper.)Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a food processor.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz crayfish shells, taken from the fresh crayfish tails (below)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 wreck fish fillets (or sea bass), skin on, pin boned
1 tsp fennel pollen (or ground fennel seeds)
